name: whenever
author: Cobray
short: Automated tournament management system for Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links
description: Comprehensive tournament management system with deck validation, bracket generation, and match result tracking for Duel Links competitions.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Whenever cog! Use [p]whenever to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores temporary tournament data including participant IDs, deck lists, and match results. Data is automatically cleared after tournament completion.
